arStrings.szText: Each time you hit an enemy with {c_important}Scourge{/c} you gain {c_number}[{SF_20}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage vs Crowd Controlled enemies for {c_number}{SF_22}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_20}*{SF_21}*100|%x|]{/c}.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Hitting an enemy affected by {c_important}Scourge{/c} has up to a {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Life Steal {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} of the damage done, up to {c_number}[{SF_19} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_19]){/c}.
Casting {c_important}Scourge{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Vigor over {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} seconds.
